00097 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00098  * Classes
00099  */
00100 
00105 class string_array_sink
00106 {
00107 public:
00109     typedef string_array_sink     class_type;
00110 
00111 public:
00113     string_array_sink(int fh)
00114         : m_fh(fh)
00115         , m_delim()
00116     {}
00118     string_array_sink(int fh, char const* delim)
00119         : m_fh(fh)
00120         , m_delim(delim)
00121     {}
00122 
00123 public:
00125     class_type& write(size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results, int flags)
00126     {
00127         stlsoft::auto_buffer<iovec>     vectors(numResults + 2);
00128         ff_string_slice_t               crlf = fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform();
00129 
00130 #ifdef STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC
00131         if(!vectors.empty())
00132 #endif /* STLSOFT_CF_THROW_BAD_ALLOC */
00133         {
00134             STLSOFT_ASSERT(vectors.size() == numResults + 2);
00135 
00136             { for(size_t i = 0; i != vectors.size() - 2; ++i)
00137             {
00138                 vectors[i].iov_base =   const_cast<char*>(results[i].ptr);
00139                 vectors[i].iov_len  =   results[i].len;
00140             }}
00141 
00142             if(!m_delim.empty())
00143             {
00144                 vectors[vectors.size() - 2].iov_base    =   const_cast<char*>(m_delim.data());
00145                 vectors[vectors.size() - 2].iov_len     =   m_delim.size();
00146             }
00147             else
00148             {
00149                 vectors.resize(vectors.size() - 1);
00150             }
00151 
00152             if(flags::ff_newLine & flags)
00153             {
00154                 vectors[vectors.size() - 1].iov_base    =   const_cast<char*>(crlf.ptr);
00155                 vectors[vectors.size() - 1].iov_len     =   crlf.len;
00156             }
00157             else
00158             {
00159                 vectors.resize(vectors.size() - 1);
00160             }
00161 
00162             if(::writev(m_fh, &vectors[0], static_cast<int>(vectors.size())) < 0)
00163             {
00164 #ifdef STLSOFT_CF_EXCEPTION_SUPPORT
00165                 throw platformstl::platform_exception("failed to write vector payload", errno);
00166 #endif /* STLSOFT_CF_EXCEPTION_SUPPORT */
00167             }
00168 
00169 #if 0
00170             if(flags::ff_flush & flags)
00171             {
00172                 ::flush(m_fh);
00173             }
00174 #endif /* 0 */
00175         }
00176 
00177         return *this;
00178     }
00179 
00180 private:
00181     int         m_fh;
00182     std::string m_delim;
00183 };
00184 
00185 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00186  * Action Shims
00187  */
00188 
00194 inline string_array_sink& fmt_slices(string_array_sink& sink, int flags, size_t /* cchTotal */, size_t numResults, ff_string_slice_t const* results)
00195 {
00196     return sink.write(numResults, results, flags);
00197 }
